overview: After a series of thoughts that we were pleased with, we publish here today on your site the content of Plus, the first episodes of the Ihsan from the Future program for the famous presenter Ahmed Al Shugairi, the dates of the replay, and the date of the presentation of the first and second part of the Ihsan Al Mustakbal program, which preacher Ahmed Al Shugairi returns to MBC screen.
title: Ehsan from the Future
